npm shorthands

2015/01

npm provides several shorthand commands out of the box.

Here's the list

{
  "un": "uninstall",
  "rb": "rebuild",
  "list": "ls",
  "ln": "link",
  "create": "init",
  "i": "install",
  "it": "install-test",
  "cit": "install-ci-test",
  "up": "update",
  "c": "config",
  "s": "search",
  "se": "search",
  "unstar": "star",
  "tst": "test",
  "t": "test",
  "ddp": "dedupe",
  "v": "view",
  "run": "run-script"
}

which also can be found in the source.
